mapper.sql: A.ID as A_ID, A.FLAG_TYPE as A_FLAG_TYPE, A.FLAG_ID as A_FLAG_ID, A.PERIOD_TYPE as A_PERIOD_TYPE, A.START_TIME as A_START_TIME, A.END_TIME as A_END_TIME, A.RECORD_STATUS as A_RECORD_STATUS, A.UPDATE_COUNT as A_UPDATE_COUNT, A.CREATOR_ID as A_CREATOR_ID, A.CREATE_DATE as A_CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATER_ID as A_UPDATER_ID, A.UPDATE_DATE as A_UPDATE_DATE, A.AVAILABLE_DAYS as A_AVAILABLE_DAYS, A.START_DATE as A_START_DATE, A.END_DATE as A_END_DATE
mapper.select:
select
from ATY_PERIOD A
order by
${orderBy}
mapper.insert:
select ATY_PERIOD_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into ATY_PERIOD (ID, FLAG_TYPE, FLAG_ID, PERIOD_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME, RECORD_STATUS, UPDATE_COUNT, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE, AVAILABLE_DAYS, START_DATE, END_DATE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{periodFlagType,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{periodFlagId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{periodType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{availableDays,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
update ATY_PERIOD A
A.ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.FLAG_TYPE = #{record.periodFlagType,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.FLAG_ID = #{record.periodFlagId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.PERIOD_TYPE = #{record.periodType,jdbcType=OTHER},
A.START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.UPDATE_COUNT = #{record.updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{record.updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.AVAILABLE_DAYS = #{record.availableDays,jdbcType=OTHER},
A.START_DATE = #{record.startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.END_DATE = #{record.endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update ATY_PERIOD A
A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.FLAG_TYPE = #{periodFlagType,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.PERIOD_TYPE = #{periodType,jdbcType=OTHER},
A.START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, A.END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.UPDATE_COUNT = #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.AVAILABLE_DAYS = #{availableDays,jdbcType=OTHER},
A.START_DATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIME}, A.END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIME},
where A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select A.FLAG_TYPE,A.FLAG_ID,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME,'HH24:MI:SS') AS START_TIME,TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME,'HH24:MI:SS') AS END_TIME FROM ATY_PERIOD A WHERE A.START_DATE < SYSDATE AND A.END_DATE > SYSDATE AND (A.AVAILABLE_DAYS LIKE('%'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1,'dd')||'%') OR A.AVAILABLE_DAYS LIKE('%'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1,'day','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=AMERICAN')||'%'))
mapper.delete: delete from ATY_PERIOD where FLAG_TYPE = #{periodFlagType,jdbcType=CHAR} AND FLAG_ID = #{periodFlagId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
